messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Shannon's Sig line
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Joanna.  And my heart goes out to you as well.  I can’t even imagine what you’ve gone through losing two babies and one in utero, no less.
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Joanna. And my heart goes out to you as well. I cant even imagine
what youve gone through losing two babies and one in utero, no less.
(((((((Joanna)))))))

Shannon


I'm sorry about your baby Shannon.

It's really wierd how things happen. Connections.
I was just redoing my profile at unschooling.com message boards.
I added a picture of my kids, then I started reading others profiles
and I saw Sandra had added some topics to hers and one was "kids" and
she listed hers. I decided that would be cool and I just finished.
I have two children who have died. Many here know of Sam, but I also
lost a baby over 10 years ago. I was 8 mos. pregnant with him, when
he got so tangled up in the umbilicle cord that he cut off his oxygen.
We had known he was a boy and had already named him Jay.
I had trouble figuring out how to put him in my list of kids with
dates (he really only had one). I ended up writing;

Carly 9/7/90, Jay- died 3/1/93 (I was 8 mos. pregnant with him), Sam
2/14/94 - 1/19/03, Jack 10/19/96, Jamie 5/21/99

Anyway, it took me a while to get that right, then I come here and
there is a whole thread on listing your kids and the confusion with
dates of those who have died. Wierd....

Again, I'm so sorry for your loss.
Joanna

messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Shannon's Sig line
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Earthmomma67 Shannon, have you tried subbing the dashes for slashes? It may be clearer. ex. Carsten born at home 4/27/99 - 5/19/00 Elissa Thanks
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Earthmomma67
Shannon,
have you tried subbing the dashes for slashes? It may be clearer.
ex. Carsten born at home 4/27/99 - 5/19/00
Elissa


Thanks Elissa. Yes I did that yesterday and I think it looks much clearer
now.

Shannon Buckley
Mom to Connor 3/15/97, Carsten born at home 4/27/99 - 5/19/00 and Quinn born
at home 8/08/02

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Shannon's Sig line
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/8/2003 5:58:49 PM Eastern Daylight Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: That is our second son who died when he was 12mos,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/8/2003 5:58:49 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
That is our second son who died when he was 12mos, 22days old. Maybe I
should put it another way. I had always wondered whether people would
understand what that meant. But you are the first to ask.

Shannon Buckley
Mom to Connor 3-15-97, Carsten born at home 4-27-99/5-19-00 and Quinn born
at home 8-08-02
Shannon,
have you tried subbing the dashes for slashes? It may be clearer.
ex. Carsten born at home 4/27/99 - 5/19/00
Elissa
